item.title: Yarn 3 Monorepo Project Template
item.description: yarn3-monorepo Project Template I’ve taken the learnings from the previously created project templates and merged them into a monorepo. Check it out: https://github.com/oliversalzburg/yarn3-monorepo Key Features The project repository and dependencies are to be managed with modern Yarn (Berry/v2/v3). Yarn Plug ’n’ Play, or PnP has been disabled in favor of using node_modules. PnP is generally preferred for strictness, but node_modules incur less friction. The default configuration does not utilize Yarn Zero-Installs, which are usually enabled by default in new projects.
